name: Monkey Fish
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game: Advanced Class Guide © 2014, Paizo Inc.
text: Your hands and feet alter to make you better at climbing and swimming. You gain a 10 foot climb speed and swim speed. This spell has no effect if you are wearing medium or heavy armor or carrying a medium or heavy load.
text_zh: 你的手脚会产生变化，这使得你更便于攀爬或游泳。你获得10尺攀爬速度和游泳速度。若你穿戴中甲或重甲、或者负载为中载或重载的话，该法术就不会有效果。
